title: (x) "Gifts & Gimmicks" grotesque from comic book ad - Free (old Filmotype font) {Mark S}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gifts_6698.jpg)

Doesn't look so special but I just can't recognize it. Anyone?

Cheers.
author: Iznik

comments.content: Looks very similar to Futura Extra Bold.
Hm the 's' doesn't look like Futura.
Could be something like a very tightly spaced Kabel Black.

This appears to be an old Filmotype font from the fifties called Free. [Flyer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052518/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/flyer/) is similar, but not as bold.

BTW, Stuart Sandler (Font Diner, Mr. Retro) has begun reviving the entire Filmotype library, so Free may see the light of day again.
